Class SignedInfo

java.lang.Object
  ee.sk.digidoc.SignedInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class SignedInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Represents an XML-DSIG SignedInfo block

Version:
1.0
Author:
Veiko Sinivee

public java.util.ArrayList validate()

Returns:

calculateDigest

public byte[] calculateDigest()
                       throws DigiDocException
Calculates the digest of SignedInfo block If the user has set origDigest attribute which is allways done when reading the XML file, then this digest is returned otherwise a new digest is calculated.

Returns:
SignedInfo block digest
Throws:
DigiDocException

             throws DigiDocException
